sub_title: IT Serialization Lead at Alnylam Pharmaceuticals
summary: Experienced Supply Chain Specialist passionate about planning and organizing with deep knowledge of supply chain processes and organization and skills related to the demand, forecast and supply planning; passionate Supply Chain Master Data manager, experienced in setting up ERP system from supply chain perspective from scratch ; always criticize the way how it is done and looking for improvement opportunity

school.name: Kursk State Agricultural Academy named after I.I. Ivanov

education.field_of_study: Economy and management at the agricultural enterprise

school.name: Aeres University of Applied Sciences Wageningen
Kursk State Agricultural Academy named after I.I. Ivanov

education.field_of_study: Economy and management at the agricultural enterprise

profile_positions.description:
-	Managed Master Data, transferred the acquired products into JD Edwards,  architected setup processes for the ERP system, created product portfolios for multi-level production at various manufacturers in the UK, Sweden and France.
-	Executed the setup of serialization of the portfolios in Tracelink, updated data with the new regulatory requirements.
-	Improved and harmonized Master Data, defined requirements based on the business needs, supervised system tests, deployed updates to live environments and provided trainings to users.
-	Developed and lead cross-functional integration of the acquired portfolio into the new S&OP and supply chain processes.
-	Owned the end-to-end supply chain planning of products with the revenue >30M euro including vendor and 3rd party management.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Data and System Process Specialist

profile_positions.description:
-	Managed the configuration of the new EPR system settings and options, developed specifications of business requirements, drafted and executed the UAT, developed costs effective processes.
-	Owned Master Data: from creation and migration to standardization and integrity assurance.
-	Lead the program related to data discovery and integration to support key supply chain management activities - demand, supply and inventory planning.
-	Owned end-to-end supply chain planning process for the product portfolio with revenue > 90M euro, including MRP, DRP and SI&OP.
-	Managed the relationships with external CMOs and other partners to ensure uninterrupted supply chain flow.
-	Performed analysis of production, inventory control, sales, costs and developed new SI&OP processes.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain & IT SPecialist

profile_positions.description:
- Management of  regional and worldwide strategic customers and the biggest PAN European distributors (volume >1M per quarter per account); bringing relationships to the new level; maintenance of sales targets and reports; track of the KPI, close cooperation with Sales and Marketing (promotions, new launches and special projects)
- Development and maintenance of the customer forecast (including modelling, analysis) and supply plan based on inventory targets and customer demand; reporting risk to corporate management on weekly basis
- Management of inventory and aged inventory levels at customer and own warehouses
- Supply allocation, scheduling and demanding; managing backlog; shipping and resolving non-shipped lines. Set up new customers in the system including VAT and customer requirenments
- Project management: leading the projects within and between the departments, including EDI interconnection projects involved third party (service provider)
- Elaboration of simplified but more effective internal key customer management system; elaboration of inventory targets tracking system for distribution customers
- Improvement of the supply chain strategies and processes among the teams worldwide (cross-functional) and for certain accounts – leading role in the related projects, working with senior management within organization
- Participation in implementation of the new Demantra system design specifically per supply chain group requirements
- Resolving escalated issues including finance, inventory audit, technical issues
- Leading and guiding team members (account administrators)
profile_positions.title: Account Manager II / Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Management of  strategic accounts (volume >1M per quarter per account), distributors, regional OEM; maintenance of sales targets and reports (weekly, monthly, quarterly) in collaboration with Sales and Marketing partners
- Management of the customers demand forecast including modelling with reporting to corporate management on weekly, monthly and quarterly basis
- Development of the supply plan on weekly basis for strategic customers based on forecast and inventory targets, risk management including reporting to corporate
- Maintenance of inventory targets for strategic and distribution customers based on customer specific and corporate requirements; aging inventory management; EOL and new launches
- Order Management in Oracle and SalesForce, demanding and allocating, trubleshooting of not shipped lined
- Creation and maintenance of the process manuals for the team and new hires
- Participation in the projects related to process improvements within Account Management department (processes and data flow); data analysis
- Resolving customers' issues: credit, logistics, RMA, etc
profile_positions.title: Account Manager I / Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Coordination of the company daily activity 
- Supply chain for own and customer projects: forecasting demand for equipment to the vendors, executing purchase, preparing delivery plan and ensuring actual delivery
- Inventory management at own and customer warehouse including inventory targets, aging inventory, RMA services and tracking records including participation in designing ERP system
- Vendor management: developing relationships, conducting regular business reviews, tracking KPIs (disti partners and data centers)
- Project Management: internal and external network projects in IX transit, data centers interconnections including planning, budgeting, supply chain operations and projecting technical work for engineers 
- Elaboration of the unique records system for patch panels connections and data centers equipment (including complex equipment like Cisco and servers) what saves the time during the planning of the new projects and helps to manage all connections effectively and related services and capacities internally and externally
- Purchase order control: preparing and  issuing of purchase orders, ensuring delivery of equipment and on-time payment back to vendor
- Payroll control: issue and check on time payments for customer invoices
- Bookkeeping activity: preparing documents for bookkeepers on monthly base
profile_positions.title: Administrative Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Assistance to Sales Manager with processes and customers
-	Support of Russian customer
-	Elaboration of the strategy how to enter to the Russian flower bulbs market
profile_positions.title: Trainee
